metas.title: Cheltenham Gold Cup Result 2012 | Winner | Places | Synchronised | Festival
metas.keys: cheltenham gold cup result 2012, winner, places, odds, synchronised, festival, betting, long run, kauto star, review, jockey, tranier, connections
metas.description: The full result of the 2012 Cheltenham Gold Cup at the Festival with Synchronised the winner ahead of Long Run and The Giant Bolster.

page.content:
Cheltenham Gold Cup Result 2012

We have had a great Gold Cup this year with a surprise winner in the form of Synchronised for Jonjo O'Neill and owner JP McManus. AP McCoy looked to be struggling on the horse early on but he stayed on brilliantly to pass Long Run and The Giant Bolster over the last and in the end he won a touch cosily.

A special mention should go to Kauto Star who was pulled up on the first circuit after struggling to travel. He clearly was not at his best after his fall at home and he could have made his last visit to a race track as a runner , he was given a massive round of applause as he came in.

15:20 Betfred Cheltenham Gold Cup Chase (Grade 1) (Class 1, 3m 2f 110y)
1. Synchronised (A P McCoy) 8/1
2. The Giant Bolster (T Scudamore) 50/1
3. Long Run (Mr S Waley-Cohen) 7/4Fav
14 Ran
